root.name: Follow Hoothoot
root.description: OverviewHoothoot is learning to dance and you must copy it's moves, much like playing a game of Simon.How to accessIn order to access the game, you must scan in the following cards from the "Pokemon: Skyridge-e" set on your GBA E-Reader:# 65 - Hoothoot (C)#105 - Sunflora (C)#112 - Venonat (C)#114 - Weedle (C)
